Dead by daylight

游戏刚发行的时候，我被独特的1V4玩法以及屠夫砍人吸引。然而游戏越来越火，一些BUG还是存在。火了一段时间以后国内不让播了，游戏瞬间凉了一半（我个人觉得），我也随之弃坑（那时候我好像是大一还是大二来着，现在工作三年了）。如今怀念当时的屠夫回来玩玩，发现改动好多（尤其是红苹果二挂才能杀，我吐了）。屠夫上高配可以和车队打一打，正常的屠夫面对语音4人车队还是不太好打。虽然前一段时间免费了，但是感觉萌新也不是很多的样子。这游戏也就这样了，寄！

Увлекательная игра

The game is okay. I love everything about it; the objectives, the bloodpoint system, etc. but the one thing that makes this game frustrating is the overwhelming amount of power that the killers each have. We ran into a game against a huntress using an add-on that allows her to one-hit survivors into the downed state just by successfully hitting a survivor with her hatchet. This shouldn't be something killers have access to, it causes some matches to be practically unwinnable and continues to make my friends and I constantly rage at the game. Fortunately enough, it doesn't happen in every single match. For that reason, I'll continue playing this game but the killers need to lose access to game-breaking perks/add-ons/offerings for it to truly be considered a great game.

As well as what I've written above, I also believe the Gideon Meat Plant map needs to be changed/removed. The map is ridiculously small, allowing the killer to move to the survivors before they're even able to reach the closest generator.

If you're reading this review to know whether or not you should get Dead By Daylight, then I'll conclude it for you; It's a good game but each game can be a very inconsistent experience and will anger you sometimes. Definitely not recommended for people who can't stand losing.
Good game
Addictive. Dislike on how long it takes to get into a lobby as a survivor.

まだやった事が無い人には絶対お薦め出来ません。私はこの超絶クソゲーに下手にハマってしまい基本的にソロで3000時間以上やり込んでいたものです。当たり前のようにバグがあり、チートも横行していて、マッチングもほとんどの場合が激遅で民度も最悪です。煽り行為は特に気にならないのですが、チート行為は個人的に許せないので通報＆ブロックを何度もしていたのですが全く機能しておらず、運営もいつになっても全く改善する様子が見られないので心底呆れ果てました。
ホラー要素は初見だけで、慣れてくるとサバイバー、キラー共に立ち回りとパークやアドオンと言った特技を探る知識ゲーになり多少は楽しめるかもしれませんが、結局皆大体似たような構成になってきて飽きてきます。そこにマッチングで10分以上待たされた挙句、チーターとのマッチが連続すると怒りと殺意と破壊衝動に駆られます。心が折れるとか悔しいとかじゃなく、2度言いますが『怒りと殺意と破壊衝動』が込み上げてきます。ほぼまともな試合は出来ません。
まだまだ不満な要素は満載なのですが、最期に貴方の人生の貴重な時間をこの超絶クソゲーに浪費させられたくなければ絶対に購入してはいけません。
因みに結構やり込んだゲームだったので迷ったのですがアンインストールしました。PC容量の邪魔だし、目に入るだけでストレスなので。人生を無駄遣いしたことをとても後悔しています。
以上、経験者からの忠告でした。

Ironic how the game is tagged survival horror, but the game isn't scary at all once you get your bearings as a survivor. If anything the game is a comedy once you learn how to loop and spin-juke killers.

Been playing DBD for a while now. Absolutley love this game. Good variety of killers, survivors and maps. Does still many updates and are really fun to play with your friends over discord and tilt killers. Without a doubt the best 4V1 game out on the market.

started playing because i love horror, now i consider it the worst decision ive made. please dont bother buying this game. its not what you think it is, and i genuinely think it will only get worse. i havent had fun playing this game since my first 10 hours. you see the same perks every match, the same items, playstyles, cosmetics, behavior etc to the point where it all blends together into the most unenjoyable game ive ever had the unfortunate suffer of playing. everytime i stop playingf it feels like ive been beating myself on the head with a hammer for hours. and now after the whole nft shit im never touching this again. the game went free on epic a little while back and the majority who got it uninstalled after a few days, it was so bad that BHVR actually mentioned it in the patch notes, said it was because of the mmr system, the thing they havent even finished since the games launch. which isnt even the reason for why it flopped so hard on epic. the developers are out of touch, community sees them as gods who can do no wrong, and contribute to the worst online game experience ive had.
